channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 02:42 Drive alarm to Cherkasy district.This followed by further reports.
item.description: 游릭 02:42 Drive alarm to Cherkasy district.This followed by further reports.#Cherkasy This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 01:12 Drawing of anxiety in Kharkiv region. Consider, anxiety is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lauda territorial community- Vovchansk Territorial Community

Consider, anxiety is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lauda territorial community- Vovchansk Territorial Community#Kharkiv_.
